title: 我的世界，1.10.2解密+小游戏，weird floor怪异地板，没事儿走两步。
author: jackal787
txt_content:
英文名称：weird floor作者：MAGITROP
大家好，这次带来的是1.10.2的解密地图，weird floor，怪异地板，我们要规划路线来穿过房间，不同的方块上方或下方都会给你不同的效果，有的是随机传送，有的是加速，有的是燃烧，一共44关+1个最终关，是个趣味十足的小游戏。
下载地址在视频下方的简介中。
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTY2ODU4NzM5Mg==.html原贴内容
Hey guys! Welcome to the map "WeirdFloor"!In this map you will have to maneuver yourway around special blocks that have a specific effect.There are 7 types of blocks with differenteffects that work when you step ON it and another 7 types of blocks withdifferent effects that work when you pass UNDER it.There are 44 different levels and 3different types of level: Easy, Medium and Hard!Don't worry, after each level there arecheckpoints.Download this map and start having fun!There are 7 types of blocks that:Set fire to you.Give you Speed III.Poison you.Slow you.Heal you.Teleport you.Kill you. 翻译欢迎来到怪异地板，这张图中，你要设计行走路线，通过那些能给你古怪效果的方块。一共有7种不同的效果，有些是当你站在上面时触发，有些是当你在它下方时触发。总共有3个难度，44个关卡，分为简单、中等、困难，每个关卡都有记录点，祝你玩的开心。7种效果方块燃烧、速度3、中毒、减速3、瞬间治疗、随机传送、死亡。

replies.author: jackal787
